metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16487 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A prototype pollution vulnerability was found in lodash <4.17.11 where the functions merge, mergeWith, and defaultsDeep can be tricked into adding or modifying properties of Object.prototype.

criterions.comment: node-lodash package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.17.11+dfsg-4').
